sysAppData.name: DroneFlights
sysAppData.desc: Order a flight from drone operators in an area of your selection, complete the transaction and receive Result Data upon flight completion.

terrain.name: Terrain & Orthomosaics
terrain.desc: Point clouds, terrain data, and imagery orthomosaics for your PV, civil engineering, architecture, or construction projects, anywhere in the world.

35.name: Photogrammetry
35.desc: <TextBlock TextAlignment='Left' TextWrapping='Wrap'><Bold>Deliverables</Bold><LineBreak/>â€¢ Digital Surface Model - 2.5D<LineBreak/>â€¢ Ground Control Points - 3D<LineBreak/>â€¢ Orthomosaic - 2D<LineBreak/>â€¢ Point Cloud from Photogrammetry - 3D<LineBreak/>â€¢ Unprocessed Pictures<LineBreak/></TextBlock>

44.name: LiDAR & Photogrammetry
44.desc: <TextBlock TextAlignment='Left' TextWrapping='Wrap'><Bold>Deliverables</Bold><LineBreak/>â€¢ Digital Surface Model - 2.5D<LineBreak/>â€¢ Ground Control Points - 3D<LineBreak/>â€¢ Point Cloud from LIDAR - 3D<LineBreak/>â€¢ Surface data XML - 3D<LineBreak/>â€¢ Survey Report<LineBreak/></TextBlock>

dlgSelCat.title: Drone Flights by Plex-Earth
dlgSelCat.text: <TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H3}'>Drone Flights by Plex-Earth</TextBlock><Image Width='1' Source='https://goto.plexearth.com/pe23/app/drones/dialogs/category/pixel'/><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H5}'>Please have in mind that you will not be charged automatically<LineBreak/>at any step of the process.<LineBreak/>You can read more about the procedure in <Hyperlink Foreground='{DynamicResource ThemeModernOrange}' NavigateUri='https://goto.plexearth.com/pe23/app/drones/dialogs/category/learnmore?wky=[$wky]'>this tutorial</Hyperlink><LineBreak/>or <Hyperlink Foreground='{DynamicResource ThemeModernOrange}' NavigateUri='https://goto.plexearth.com/pe23/app/drones/dialogs/category/contact?wky=[$wky]'>contact our support team</Hyperlink> for any question you might have.</TextBlock>

dlgSelProd.title: Select your drone service product
dlgSelProd.text: <TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H3}'>Select your drone service product</TextBlock><Image Width='1' Source='https://goto.plexearth.com/pe23/app/drones/dialogs/products/pixel'/><LineBreak/><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H5}'>Below are the drone service products available for your project area.</TextBlock>

sysStrings.droneProd:TextHasDiscount: ðŸ’Ž Your DroneFlights Beta benefit[$droneProd:discountPerc]% DISCOUNT[$droneProd:currencySymbol][$droneProd:price][$droneProd:currencySymbol][$droneProd:priceDiscounted]Price is exclusive of VAT or taxes applicable in certain countries.
sysStrings.droneProd:BtnHasDiscount: Grab this offer!You will not be charged automatically

droneProd:ActionSuccess_AcceptPrice.content: <Grid VerticalAlignment='Center' MaxWidth='900'><Image Width='1' Source='[$string:droneProd:urlOrderSuccess_Pixel]'/><TextBlock Opacity='1'><Image Width='900' Source='[$string:droneProd:urlOrderSuccess_Image]'/></TextBlock><StackPanel><DockPanel Margin='24'><DockPanel.Background><SolidColorBrush Color='#101010' Opacity='0.8'/></DockPanel.Background><StackPanel Margin='24'><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H1}' Foreground='White' TextWrapping='Wrap'>Flight [$droneOrder:flightId] is awaiting you!</TextBlock><TextBlock Margin='8' Style='{DynamicResource H3}' Foreground='White' TextWrapping='Wrap'>Your request has been submitted and you must have received a confirmation email. We will contact you soon to finalize the order.</TextBlock><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H4}'><Hyperlink Foreground='{DynamicResource ThemeModernOrange}' NavigateUri='action:gotoContact'>For any question contact us at support@plexscape.com</Hyperlink></TextBlock></StackPanel></DockPanel></StackPanel></Grid>
droneProd:ActionSuccess_AcceptPrice.title: Order submitted

droneProd:ActionFailure_ActionPrice.content: <Grid VerticalAlignment='Center' MaxWidth='900'><Image Width='1' Source='[$string:droneProd:urlOrderFail_Pixel]'/><TextBlock Opacity='1'><Image Width='900' Source='[$string:droneProd:urlOrderFail_Image]'/></TextBlock><StackPanel><DockPanel Margin='24'><DockPanel.Background><SolidColorBrush Color='#101010' Opacity='0.8'/></DockPanel.Background><StackPanel Margin='24'><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H1}' Foreground='White' TextWrapping='Wrap'>Something went wrong!</TextBlock><TextBlock Margin='8' Style='{DynamicResource H3}' Foreground='White' TextWrapping='Wrap'>Our team is here to assist, by providing us the code below:</TextBlock><StackPanel Margin='8' Orientation='Horizontal'><TextBox Background='Transparent' Foreground='#000' BorderThickness='0' HorizontalAlignment='Stretch' VerticalAlignment='Center' IsReadOnly='True'>[$droneProd:jobId]</TextBox></StackPanel><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H4}'><Hyperlink Foreground='{DynamicResource ThemeModernOrange}' NavigateUri='action:gotoContact'>Contact us at support@plexscape.com</Hyperlink></TextBlock></StackPanel></DockPanel></StackPanel></Grid>

droneProd:ActionSuccess_TalkToExperts.content: <Grid VerticalAlignment='Center' MaxWidth='900'><Image Width='1' Source='[$string:droneProd:urlTalkSuccess_Pixel]'/><TextBlock Opacity='1'><Image Width='900' Source='[$string:droneProd:urlTalkSuccess_Image]'/></TextBlock><StackPanel><DockPanel Margin='24'><DockPanel.Background><SolidColorBrush Color='#101010' Opacity='0.8'/></DockPanel.Background><StackPanel Margin='24'><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H1}' Foreground='White' TextWrapping='Wrap'>We got your request!</TextBlock><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H4}' Foreground='White'>One of our agents will be in touch with you soon or<LineBreak/><Hyperlink Foreground='{DynamicResource ThemeModernOrange}' NavigateUri='action:gotoContact'>contact us at support@plexscape.com</Hyperlink></TextBlock></StackPanel></DockPanel></StackPanel></Grid>
droneProd:ActionSuccess_TalkToExperts.title: Experts speaking!

droneProd:ActionFailure_TalkToExperts.content: <Grid VerticalAlignment='Center' MaxWidth='900'><Image Width='1' Source='[$string:droneProd:urlTalkFailure_Pixel]'/><TextBlock Opacity='1'><Image Width='900' Source='[$string:droneProd:urlTalkFailure_Image]'/></TextBlock><StackPanel><DockPanel Margin='24'><DockPanel.Background><SolidColorBrush Color='#101010' Opacity='0.8'/></DockPanel.Background><StackPanel Margin='24'><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H1}' Foreground='White' TextWrapping='Wrap'>We didn't receive your request!</TextBlock><TextBlock Margin='8' Style='{DynamicResource H3}' Foreground='White' TextWrapping='Wrap'>But our team is here to assist, by providing us the code below:</TextBlock><StackPanel Margin='8' Orientation='Horizontal'><TextBox Background='Transparent' Foreground='#000' BorderThickness='0' HorizontalAlignment='Stretch' VerticalAlignment='Center' IsReadOnly='True'>[$droneProd:jobId]</TextBox></StackPanel><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H4}'><Hyperlink Foreground='{DynamicResource ThemeModernOrange}' NavigateUri='action:gotoContact'>Contact us at support@plexscape.com</Hyperlink></TextBlock></StackPanel></DockPanel></StackPanel></Grid>
droneProd:ActionFailure_TalkToExperts.title: Message lost in space
